member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.Get
member.summary: Gets the current state of the controller.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.Replace
member.summary: Changes (or indicates a change to) the entire state of the controller.\nThis is sent initially to every connection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.Poll
member.summary: Polls the controller and updates the state since the controller was last polled.\nThe controller is automatically polled 20 times a second.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.ChangeController
member.summary: Changes which game controller is in use.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.UpdateAxes
member.summary: Indicates when one of the axes is moved.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.UpdateButtons
member.summary: Indicates when one or more buttons is pressed or released.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.UpdatePovHats
member.summary: Indicates when the position of a Point-Of-View (POV) hat switch is changed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.UpdateSliders
member.summary: Indicates when the position of a slider is changed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.Subscribe
member.summary: Subscribe message that adds another service to the subscriber list so that notifications can be sent to that service.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.GameController.Proxy.GetControllers
member.summary: Returns a list of attached controllers.
